qoutes.name: quote1
qoutes.qoute: "The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more, that plants the fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. That's what I hope to give you forever."

qoutes.name: quote2
qoutes.qoute: "I look at you and see the rest of my life in front of my eyes."

qoutes.name: quote3
qoutes.qoute: "The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves."

qoutes.name: quote4
qoutes.qoute: "All, everything that I understand, I only understand because I love."

qoutes.name: quote5
qoutes.qoute: "And remember, as it was written, to love another person is to see the face of God."

qoutes.name: quote6
qoutes.qoute: "It's a very dangerous state. You are inclined to recklessness and kind of tune out the rest of your life and everything that's been important to you. It's actually not all that pleasurable. I don't know who the hell wants to get in a situation where you can't bear an hour without somebody's company."

qoutes.name: quote7
qoutes.qoute: "The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart."

qoutes.name: quote8
qoutes.qoute: "To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that's everything."

qoutes.name: quote9
qoutes.qoute: "I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more."

qoutes.name: quote10
qoutes.qoute: "In order to be happy oneself it is necessary to make at least one other person happy."

qoutes.name: quote11
qoutes.qoute: "The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic to these things. You meet someone and you fall in love and that's that."

qoutes.name: quote12
qoutes.qoute: "There's no substitute for a great love who says, 'No matter what's wrong with you, you're welcome at this table.'"

qoutes.name: quote13
qoutes.qoute: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not

qoutes.name: quote14
qoutes.qoute: I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.

qoutes.name: quote15
qoutes.qoute: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.

qoutes.name: quote16
qoutes.qoute: I realized I was thinking of you, and I began to wonder how long you'd been on my mind. Then it occurred to me: Since I met you, you've never left.

qoutes.name: quote17
qoutes.qoute: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.

qoutes.name: quote18
qoutes.qoute: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness, that most frightens us. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine as children do. It's not just in some of us; it is in everyone. And as we let our own lights shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others

qoutes.name: quote19
qoutes.qoute: Life is filled with highs and lows valleys and peaks that will test your resilience, that will push you to overcome challenges and the lessons you'll learn on your way to the top will only make you stronger, better.

qoutes.name: quote20
qoutes.qoute: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.

qoutes.name: quote21
qoutes.qoute: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.

qoutes.name: quote22
qoutes.qoute: All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me.... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.

qoutes.name: quote23
qoutes.qoute: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.

qoutes.name: quote24
qoutes.qoute: There are better starters than me but I'm a strong finisher.

qoutes.name: quote25
qoutes.qoute: He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.

qoutes.name: quote26
qoutes.qoute: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.

qoutes.name: quote27
qoutes.qoute: Make up your mind that no matter what comes your way, no matter how difficult, no matter how unfair, you will do more than simply survive. You will thrive in spite of it.

qoutes.name: quote28
qoutes.qoute: Tough times never last, but tough people do.

qoutes.name: quote29
qoutes.qoute: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.

qoutes.name: quote30
qoutes.qoute: Nothing is more beautiful than the smile that has struggled through the tears.

qoutes.name: quote31
qoutes.qoute: I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day and I believe in miracles.

qoutes.name: quote32
qoutes.qoute: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.

qoutes.name: quote33
qoutes.qoute: The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.

qoutes.name: quote34
qoutes.qoute: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees The Opportunity In Every Difficulty.

qoutes.name: quote35
qoutes.qoute: Don't Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.

qoutes.name: quote36
qoutes.qoute: You Learn More From Failure Than From Success. Don't Let It Stop You. Failure Builds Character.

qoutes.name: quote37
qoutes.qoute: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any

qoutes.name: quote38
qoutes.qoute: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do, so throw off the bowlines, sail away from safe harbor, catch the trade winds in your sails.  Explore, Dream, Discover.

qoutes.name: quote39
qoutes.qoute: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

qoutes.name: quote40
qoutes.qoute: An unexamined life is not worth living.

qoutes.name: quote41
qoutes.qoute: Eighty percent of success is showing up.

qoutes.name: quote42
qoutes.qoute: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

qoutes.name: quote43
qoutes.qoute: Every child is an artist.  The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.

qoutes.name: quote44
qoutes.qoute: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.

qoutes.name: quote45
qoutes.qoute: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

qoutes.name: quote46
qoutes.qoute: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it.  Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.

qoutes.name: quote47
qoutes.qoute: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.

qoutes.name: quote48
qoutes.qoute: Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.

qoutes.name: quote49
qoutes.qoute: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

qoutes.name: quote50
qoutes.qoute: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.  Live the life you have imagined.

qoutes.name: quote51
qoutes.qoute: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me.

qoutes.name: quote52
qoutes.qoute: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.

qoutes.name: quote53
qoutes.qoute: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.

qoutes.name: quote54
qoutes.qoute: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

qoutes.name: quote55
qoutes.qoute: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

qoutes.name: quote56
qoutes.qoute: We can easily forgive a child who is afraid of the dark; the real tragedy of life is when men are afraid of the light.

qoutes.name: quote57
qoutes.qoute: Start where you are. Use what you have.  Do what you can.

qoutes.name: quote58
qoutes.qoute: Fall seven times and stand up eight.

qoutes.name: quote59
qoutes.qoute: When one door of happiness closes, another opens, but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one that has been opened for us.

qoutes.name: quote60
qoutes.qoute: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.

qoutes.name: quote61
qoutes.qoute: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.

qoutes.name: quote62
qoutes.qoute: Happiness is not something readymade.  It comes from your own actions.

qoutes.name: quote63
qoutes.qoute: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.

qoutes.name: quote64
qoutes.qoute: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.

qoutes.name: quote65
qoutes.qoute: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

qoutes.name: quote66
qoutes.qoute: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.

qoutes.name: quote67
qoutes.qoute: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.

qoutes.name: quote68
qoutes.qoute: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.

qoutes.name: quote69
qoutes.qoute: Limitations live only in our minds.  But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.

qoutes.name: quote70
qoutes.qoute: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing, no one to blame.

qoutes.name: quote71
qoutes.qoute: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.

qoutes.name: quote72
qoutes.qoute: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.

qoutes.name: quote73
qoutes.qoute: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.

qoutes.name: quote74
qoutes.qoute: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

qoutes.name: quote75
qoutes.qoute: You become what you believe.

qoutes.name: quote76
qoutes.qoute: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.

qoutes.name: quote77
qoutes.qoute: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.

qoutes.name: quote78
qoutes.qoute: It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.

qoutes.name: quote79
qoutes.qoute: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.

qoutes.name: quote80
qoutes.qoute: The battles that count aren't the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself--the invisible battles inside all of us--that's where it's at.

qoutes.name: quote81
qoutes.qoute: Education costs money.  But ignorance even more.

qoutes.name: quote82
qoutes.qoute: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.

qoutes.name: quote83
qoutes.qoute: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

qoutes.name: quote84
qoutes.qoute: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.

qoutes.name: quote85
qoutes.qoute: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.

qoutes.name: quote86
qoutes.qoute: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.

qoutes.name: quote87
qoutes.qoute: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.

qoutes.name: quote88
qoutes.qoute: It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you can with it, and make it the life you want to live.

qoutes.name: quote89
qoutes.qoute: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.

qoutes.name: quote90
qoutes.qoute: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

qoutes.name: quote91
qoutes.qoute: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.

qoutes.name: quote92
qoutes.qoute: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.

qoutes.name: quote93
qoutes.qoute: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.

qoutes.name: quote94
qoutes.qoute: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, "I'm possible!"

qoutes.name: quote95
qoutes.qoute: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

qoutes.name: quote96
qoutes.qoute: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.

qoutes.name: quote97
qoutes.qoute: Sometimes you look back at girls you spent money on rather than send it to your mum & you realise witchcraft is real
